title: DORA | Contact Us
content: Sponsor DORA research and publicationslink click to copy link By becoming a sponsor, you will reach a targeted audience of technology professions including decision-makers, practitioners, and influencers. Contact us at sponsor-dora@google.com or learn more at dora.dev/sponsors. Inquire about the research or its applicationlink click to copy link Do you have questions or suggestions about DORA research, or how to apply it in your organization? The DORA Community hosts regular meetups and a mailing list for active discussion by practitioners. Report an issuelink click to copy link on dora.dev: Have you found a technical issue on this website? Open an issue in our issue tracker. in a publication: Have you found an error in one of our publications? Check to see if it has already been acknowledged in DORA publications errata. If not, contact us to report it. Please include the publication title and page number. Speaking engagement or workshop requestlink click to copy link Contact us at dora-advocacy@google.com. Other questions or feedbacklink click to copy link Contact us at dora-advocacy@google.com.

metadata.description: DORA is a long running research program that seeks to understand the capabilities that drive software delivery and operations performance. DORA helps teams apply those capabilities, leading to better organizational performance.
metadata.keywords: DevOps, Lead time, Deploy frequency, Change fail rate, MTTR, Time to restore, metrics, DORA
